Package io.sphere.sdk.payments

Provides model classes and builders for payments.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Payment
    Payments hold information about the current state of receiving and/or refunding money, but the process itself is handled by a PSP.
    PaymentDraft
    Draft for a new Payment resource.
    PaymentMethodInfo  
    PaymentStatus  
    Transaction  
    TransactionDraft  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    PaymentDraftBuilder
    Builder for PaymentDraft.
    PaymentDraftDsl
    Dsl class for PaymentDraft.
    PaymentMethodInfoBuilder  
    PaymentStatusBuilder  
    TransactionDraftBuilder
    Builder for TransactionDraft.
    TransactionDraftDsl  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    TransactionState
    Transaction State.
    TransactionType
    Transaction Type.

Package io.sphere.sdk.payments Description

Provides model classes and builders for payments.
